snippet: Australia’s Bernard Tomic beat Dan Evans in four sets after Andy Murray gave Britain the early lead to leave its Davis Cup semifinal at Glasgow tied at 1-1.
abstract: Australia and Britain are tied, 1-1, as are Belgium and Argentina, after opening singles at Davis Cup.
lead_paragraph: Australia’s Bernard Tomic beat Dan Evans in four sets after Andy Murray gave Britain the early lead to leave its Davis Cup semifinal at Glasgow tied at 1-1.

headline.print_headline: Australia Tied With Britain in Davis Cup
headline.main: Australia Tied With Britain in Davis Cup
